types:type.name: input_csv_metadata
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type input_csv_metadata = Array<{| empId: String, empname: String, salary: String, location: String, pincode: String|}>

types:type.name: Tra_output_metadata
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type Tra_output_metadata = Array<{| empId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, empname: String, salary: Number {"typeId": "int"}, location: String, pincode: Number {"typeId": "int"}|}> {"example": "[{\\\"empId\\\":101,\\\"empname\\\":\\\"suneel\\\",\\\"salary\\\":1000,\\\"location\\\":\\\"Hyderabad\\\",\\\"pincode\\\":50070},{\\\"empId\\\":102,\\\"empname\\\":\\\"Kumar\\\",\\\"salary\\\":1000,\\\"location\\\":\\\"Chennai\\\",\\\"pincode\\\":50071}]"}
